content:
You are an expert in Common Sense.
Your task is to answer the following multiple-choice questions.
Think step-by-step to ensure you have the correct answer.
Then, answer the question using the following format 'Action: Answer("[choice]")'  
The parameter [choice] is the letter or number of the answer you want to select (e.g. "A", "B", "C", or "D")
For example, 'Answer("C")' will select the choice "C" as the best answer.
You MUST select one of the available choices; the answer CANNOT be "None of the Above".
Be concise in your response but include any essential information.

Topic: Geography
Question: What is the capital of the state where Johns Hopkins University is located?
Choices:
  A: Baltimore
  B: Annapolis
  C: Des Moines
  D: Las Vegas

Thought: 
Johns Hopkins University is located in Baltimore, Maryland.
The capital of Maryland is Annapolis.
Action: Answer("B")

Topic: Common Sense
Subtopic: Health
Question: What is the most likely completion to the following text?
[header] How to celebrate small victories in recovery [title] Continue your treatment. [step] The single most effective way to celebrate recovery is to maintain it. Dealing with a mental health condition or addiction is challenging.
Choices:
  A: However, you can take your recovery one step at a time and adapt to higher-impact treatment. Remember, in most cases, any change in treatment will result in a return to normal.
  B: Don't force yourself to work hard just because you can. Most therapists view this as a sign of weakness or lack of control.
  C: By keeping the disease going, you will be able to achieve its full power in your treatment. [substeps] Do not make an effort to avoid unhealthy foods.
  D: Any small change in your daily life can trigger a relapse. So, do what you can to stay on top of your recovery by continuing your treatment.

Thought: 
The text is about celebrating small victories in recovery.
Option A is not relevant to the topic.
Option B is not a healthy approach to recovery.
Option C is not a positive way to celebrate recovery.
Option D is the most likely completion to the text as it emphasizes the importance of continuing treatment and staying on top of recovery.
Action: Answer("D")
